front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Automatic Test Markup Language (ATML) Test Adaptor Description

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: An exchange format, using extensible markup language (XML), for identifying all of the hardware, software, and documentation associated with a test adapter is specified in this document. This test adapter may be used as a component of a test program set to test and diagnose a unit under test.
